-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

-- *
    SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

    --*.csv
    SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


    -- select data from subfolders
    SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

    --Get Data from more than 1 file

    SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv', 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=03/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


    -- use more than 1 wild card character
        SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


    --file metadata function filename()

       SELECT
    TOP 100 
    result.filename() as file_name,
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

    --how many rows are there

           SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    group by result.filename()
    order by result.filename();

-- limit data using filename()

               SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    where result.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2020-03.csv','green_tripdata_2020-04.csv')
    group by result.filename()
    order by result.filename();

-- use filepath function

                  SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
     result.filepath() as file_path,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    where result.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2020-03.csv','green_tripdata_2020-04.csv')
    group by result.filename(), result.filepath()
    order by result.filename(), result.filepath();


    -- use filpath parameters
                      SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    result.filepath(1) as year,
     result.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    where result.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2020-03.csv','green_tripdata_2020-04.csv')
    group by result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
    order by result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2);


    -- year, month record count
                          SELECT

    result.filepath(1) as year,
     result.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    group by result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
    order by result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2);

-- use file path in the where clause

                              SELECT

    result.filepath(1) as year,
     result.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    where result.filepath(1) = '2020'
    and result.filepath(2) IN ('06','07','08')
    group by result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
    order by result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2);
